column1: NGR is from 1950s record and is near Credington Hall. Stated altitude is 30 ft. too low but from the description in the record the gauge is more likley to be in the walled garden area 200m SW where the altitude is a closer match.

1911 record has a note "corr for W.D.". The corr is unclear but if right, could be short for corrected but no idea what W.D. stands for. There are no obvious corrections to the readings therefore thay have been left in this record.

Jan 1957 readings noted as being reduced by 0.64 but with no reason given and not sure if this is in the reord or whether it as reduced when transcirbed elsewhere. Reading left in this record. Note British Rainfall has same annual total as recorded here.
